main event: Observations of a small circular object with a bright white light in Albany, Oregon on February 25, 1964.
interesting points: The object was reported to span 30 degrees in the sky,The flight of the object was described as smooth, steady, and swift,The object disappeared to the south after about 15 seconds,The observer noted that the object's characteristics suggest it may have been a meteor,Another report from a different observer claimed the object resembled a jet interceptor more than a meteor.
sighted object: small circular object emitting bright white light
